name: K-Sea Transportation Partners LLC
description: K-Sea Transportation Partners LLC is a leading provider of marine transportation services in the United States, specializing in the transportation of refined petroleum products and other liquid bulk cargoes. Established in the early 2000s, K-Sea has built a reputation for reliability and safety in the maritime industry. The company operates a fleet of tank barges and tugboats, ensuring the efficient and safe movement of products such as gasoline, diesel fuel, and other essential commodities. K-Sea's commitment to operational excellence is reflected in its rigorous safety standards, well-trained personnel, and adherence to environmental regulations. By leveraging advanced technologies and maintaining a modern fleet, K-Sea Transportation Partners effectively meets the needs of its clients while minimizing environmental impact. The company serves a diverse customer base, including major oil companies, independent refiners, and other industrial clients. With a strategic focus on growth and sustainability, K-Sea continues to expand its operations to meet the evolving demands of the market. Its dedicated approach to customer service and operational efficiency positions K-Sea as a trusted partner in the marine transportation sector.

seo.meta_title: K-Sea Transportation Partners LLC | Marine Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: K-Sea Transportation Partners LLC specializes in the marine transportation of refined petroleum products. Explore our services, commitment to safety, and operational excellence.

faq.question: What services does K-Sea offer?
faq.answer: K-Sea offers marine transportation services for refined petroleum products and other liquid bulk cargoes.

faq.question: Where is K-Sea headquartered?
faq.answer: K-Sea is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What type of vessels does K-Sea operate?
faq.answer: K-Sea operates a fleet of tank barges and tugboats.
